France is updating its polar strategy amid rising geopolitical tensions in the Arctic
subhead: The strategy, which covers the period from 2026 to 2040, aims to support polar research and, above all, to address defense concerns – though it comes with no guaranteed funding.

title: The European Commission unveils plan to continue financial support for Ukraine after US aid ends
subhead: The European Commission is considering two mechanisms: a reparations loan funded by immobilized Russian central bank assets held in Europe, or a joint debt guaranteed by the EU budget. The proposals, which face opposition from Belgium and Hungary, will be on the European Council's meeting agenda on December 18 and 19.

title: 'Mektoub, My Love: Canto Due': Abdellatif Kechiche's Mediterranean gem
subhead: The director of 'Blue Is the Warmest Color' is releasing the final installment of his trilogy set in Sète, weaving a tale of intrigue and burning desire. It is a film of reconciliations and reunions, with characters who never fail to surprise.

title: Negotiating peace: A chaotic art with no established rules
subhead: Donald Trump, casting himself as mediator in the Russia-Ukraine war, has been pushing Kyiv and European leaders to accept his 'peace plan,' drafted with Moscow. His seemingly erratic approach reveals a deeper issue: the absence of any standards governing peace processes.

'Nighttime prohibition': Warsaw city center bans alcohol sales at night
subhead: Nearly 180 municipalities in Poland have already opted to ban the sale of alcohol at night. On November 1, two central districts in Warsaw followed suit. The measure, which was initially intended to apply across the entire capital, has sparked heated debate.

title: The significant trade imbalance between France and China
subhead: Even as Chinese competition increasingly undermines French industries, including in innovation, many French companies argue that maintaining a presence in China remains essential. President Emmanuel Macron is visiting the country from December 3 to 5.

title: Trump administration targets foreigners, beyond undocumented migrants
subhead: Following the attack on two National Guard soldiers in Washington, US authorities have stepped up announcements aimed at immigrants, raising the prospect of a possible 'remigration.'
